message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to let it go for $180. Would you like to make it yours?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Could we perhaps agree on $160?
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $170. Is that something you'd be interested in?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still trying to find the best deal possible. Could we possibly agree on $165?

I'm glad we're still in talks, Bob. I can see you're serious about getting a good deal. I'm willing to make one last offer, but I need to make sure I'm not losing out. I'll meet you at $168. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
Thanks for your offer, Alice. I'm still aiming to keep within my budget. Could we possibly agree on $166?
